WM.SmarterFoodSelection.Policy.label: Prisoner
WM.SmarterFoodSelection.Policy.description: Default prisoner policy.\nWill prefer the worst meals first. Will also care about the thoughts given by meals but not very much.
WM.SmarterFoodSelection.Policy.diet: MealAwful / MealSimple / MealFine / RawTasty / Kibble / RawBad / RawInsect / MealLavish / Corpse / InsectCorpse / HumanlikeCorpse
